Diamond::

She watched as the room goes dark.  She uses her heat sensors to dete 
t Vamprah. She sees the heat signature clime up the chamber and 
towards the ceiling. "You know, it's not very nice to leave when 
others are trying to help you."

She spit at Vamprah, hoping the venom would reach her eyes and make 
ehr stop long enough to get her.
